column5: News reports of Stompin' Tom Connors death at 77.  Rest in peace.
One of my heros...!  His autobiography is a great read..  For all of you who fish Georgian Bay.. here's one:
From Yahoo news:  His family gave the staff at stompintom.com a message he wanted passed along upon his death:
He "jumped in the Calabogie Lake real fast and swam both ways to catch a cross eyed bass, but he threw it to the ground and said "I can't eat that," so he covered it up with Mount St. Pat."
